errors.error_description: The 'Quick Start' section is logically incorrect. It presents the example code block before the instructions for installing the required 'fundus' package, which will cause a ModuleNotFoundError if followed sequentially.
correction_candidates: Move the 'pip install fundus' command block to be the first step in the 'Quick Start' section.
Add 'import os' to the top of the script.
Create a virtual environment before running the code.
errors.golden_answer: Move the 'pip install fundus' command block to be the first step in the 'Quick Start' section.

errors.error_description: The installation instructions include 'pip install beautifulsoup4', which is an unnecessary dependency. The 'fundus' package manages its own dependencies automatically when installed.
correction_candidates: Remove the line 'pip install beautifulsoup4'. 'fundus' handles its own dependencies.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line 'pip install beautifulsoup4'. 'fundus' handles its own dependencies.
